name: Bow of Apollo
printed_effect:
The Empowered Elestral can attack opponents'
Spirit Decks directly. When Apollo is Enchanted
and the Empowered Elestral deals damage
to an opponent you can return {solar} from
your Underworld to your Spirit Deck.
effect: The Empowered Elestral can attack opponents' Spirit Decks directly. When Apollo is Enchanted and the Empowered Elestral deals damage you can return {solar} from your Underworld to your Spirit Deck.
